text: Amphiperca is an extinct genus of prehistoric ray-finned fish that lived from the early to middle Eocene. == Description == Amphiperca was a perch-like actinopterygian. == References == # Sepkoski, Jack (2002). "A compendium of fossil marine animal genera". Bulletins of American Paleontology. 363: 1â€“560. Retrieved 2009-02-27. Category:Perciformes Category:Extinct fish Category:Eocene
title: Amphiperca
